meanings.definition: Set up (an organization, system, or set of rules) on a firm or permanent basis.
meanings.sent1: They decided to establish a new club at school for students interested in art.
meanings.sent2: The government will establish new regulations to ensure public safety.
meanings.sent3: The idea to establish a secret handshake for the club members was both fun and silly.
meanings.sent4: She worked hard to establish herself as a reliable and trustworthy leader in the community.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the tree firmly establish its place in the garden.

meanings.definition: Show (something) to be true or certain by determining the facts.
meanings.sent1: The experiment helped establish that plants need sunlight to grow.
meanings.sent2: The witness testimony will establish the innocence of the accused.
meanings.sent3: The detective's quirky methods somehow always manage to establish the truth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile established her happiness without a need for words.
meanings.sent5: The map clearly establishes the location of the hidden treasure.
